QuestData.Title: Visitor in Shal'Aran
QuestData.Description: Someone came to Shal'Aran while you were in the City. She asked for you specifically.$b$bI did not recognize her face, nor her voice, but she seemed trustworthy and earnest.$b$bShe is just outside the cavern. Meet with her and determine her purpose for coming here.
QuestData.RewardText: She looked good. The Arcan'dor truly is a miracle for our people.$b$bShe is a welcome ally in the fight to come. Silgryn will take good care of her.
